comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Love this! 

I wonder if those bustle frocks were the origin of the eternal question - "Does my bum look big in this?"

comment.author: 20958381@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] haha - i'd just thought the same thing. i reckon this might be the fashion solution for those of us today who are worried about this!

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: The bustle was designed to accentuate that part of the anatomy and make it as big as possible! In those days thin was poverty and fat was well fed and prosperous.
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
